TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WSSecurityTokenSerializer extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer

summary.para: The class used for serializing and deserializing security tokens, security key identifiers, and security key identifier clauses defined in the WS-Security, WS-Trust, and WS-SecureConversation security specifications.
